name: Product Design Template
description:
Hey there! This is a ready to go starting Figma template for the main pipeline of the product design process.


This setup will allow you to start designing fast and to structure your project in a clear way, which could upgrade your teamwork, especially during design to front-end handoffs.


Be sure, all the team, including PMâ€™s and engineers will appreciate you for this approach because it saves time and effort for everybody, for you as well.
